original_text: The Jewish leaders still did not believe that the man had really been blind. They did not want to believe that he had now become able to see. So they told the man's parents to come to them.
korean_text: 유대인들이 그가 맹인으로 있다가 보게 된 것을 믿지 아니하고 그 부모를 불러 묻되

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders still did not believe
that the man had really been blind
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 정말로 눈먼 사람이었었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: They did not want to believe
that he had now become able to see
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이제 볼 수 있게 되었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: So they told the man's parents
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그 남자의 부모에게 말했습니다
